The nearest airport is located in Szczecin (Goleniow) and Gdansk.

Koszalin is linked with other polish cities by a rail network.
There are several trains each day to Szczecin and Gdansk. Also a direct connection with Poznań exists. The price for the tickets should not be higher than €10-12.
There is a bus station (close to the train stations) serving nearby towns and other major cities in Poland.

Koszalin has a good network of city owned busses that bring you everywhere in the city. The price of a normal ticket is around €0,70-0,80.
To get to Mielno/Uniescie where the beach is you need to either take a bus No.1. leaving in the front of the station or one of the private vans who wait also in the front of the station. In the summer there is a train operating to that coast town.
